title: John Kerry ‘Funneled’ State Department Funds to Daughter’s Organization?
subtitle: Dr. Vanessa Kerry's nonprofit organization, Seed Global Health, was awarded Peace Corps funding before and after her father, John Kerry, became U.S. Secretary of State; was there a conflict of interest?
author: David Emery
vclaim: Secretary of State John Kerry "funneled" taxpayer money into his daughter's global charity.
